alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Broward County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Broward and south central Palm Beach Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 529 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Weston, or 7 miles west of Sunrise, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Coral Springs, Davie, Plantation, Sunrise, Tamarac, Margate, Lauderhill, Weston, North Lauderdale, Lauderdale Lakes, Parkland, Loxahatchee NWR, Broadview-Pompano Park, Sawgrass Mills Mall, Intersection I-75 And U.S. 27, Mile Marker 30 On Alligator Alley, East Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, Godfrey Road, Pine Island Ridge and Melrose Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
